attributes.additional_details: Include sexual coercion in the sex education curriculum
attributes.background: It’s an extremely important topic that needs to be addressed as seriously as the topics of rape and consent. Students have no idea about what sexual coercion is and they need to be educated in the importance of this issue.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Sexual coercion is already mentioned in the PHSE curriculum. You can find out more here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/781150/Draft_guidance_Relationships_Education__Relationships_and_Sex_Education__RSE__and_Health_Education2.pdf
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
